medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "March 1988 - He Tried to Carry Something Too Large, He Felt Like He Was Falling", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in r LC: [NA 1990]; LR: [W.P.]
description: Man in a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he drags a heavy object behind him as he walks; the words \"March 1988/He tried to carry something too large./He felt like he was falling\" inscribed, UC
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
